Assets.Name: Katana Master
Assets.Foreword: If you wield a katana with grace, you may Strike and Clash +edge (instead of iron). If you do...
Assets.Ability1: When you score a strong hit on a Strike, you may cede the initiative. If you do, add +2 to your next move.
Assets.Ability2: When you score a weak hit on a Clash, you may choose to inflict no harm. If you do, you have the initiative.
Assets.Ability3: When you score a strong hit on a Clash, add +1 to your next move.

Assets.Name: Aikido
Assets.Ability1: When you Face Danger +edge by evading an attack without fighting back and score a weak hit, inflict 1 harm. On a strong hit, inflict 2 harm instead. This does not represent physical damage, but fatigue or frustration on the foe's part as they struggle to engage in combat with you.
Assets.Ability2: Same as above, but add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: When you attempt to End the Fight without having used Strike or Clash in the battle, subtract -1 from each challenge die.

Assets.Name: Oaken Whirlwind
Assets.Foreword: If you wield nunchaku or tonfa...
Assets.Ability1: In your hands, these wooden weapons are deadly (2 harm). When you instead use it as a simple weapon (1 harm), you may Strike or Clash edge (instead of +iron). If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability2: When you Secure an Advantage +edge using your nunchaku to disarm, intimidate, or force back your opponent, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: When you Face Danger +edge to precisely block or deflect an incoming attack, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Leaping Dragon
Assets.Ability1: When you Strike or Clash with a savage double claw, you may add +2. If you do (decide before rolling), inflict +1 harm on a strong hit and count a weak hit as a miss.
Assets.Ability2: When you Secure an Advantage +edge using your claws to disarm or intimidate your opponent, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: When you Face Danger or Secure an Advantage+iron by climbing a treacherous surface or clinging in a precarious position using your claws to gain purchase, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Threshing Floor
Assets.Ability1: When you Secure an Advantage +edge using your flail to disarm, trip, or stun your opponent, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability2: When you Face Danger +edge by deflecting an oncoming attack or keeping your attacker at a distance, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: When you Face Danger, Secure an Advantage, or Compel +iron by hitting or breaking an inanimate object, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Scorpion Storm
Assets.Ability1: When you Secure an Advantage edge using your chain to disarm, trip, stun, or push back your opponent, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability2:
When you Strike by first entangling your opponent then slashing, choose one (decide before rolling).
  • Get over here: Roll +edge. On a weak hit, you retain initiative.
  • Finish them: Roll +iron. A weak hit counts as a miss. On a strong hit, you may End the Fight and reroll any challenge dice.
Assets.Ability3: When you Clash against multiple opponents, you may add +1. If you do and score a hit, inflict I harm (instead of 2 harm) and you have the initiative.

Assets.Name: Suzaku
Assets.Ability1: Rebirth: If your phoenix misses on Companion Endure Harm when at 0 health, roll +heart. On a strong hit, the phoenix bursts into flame dealing 3 harm to foes and returns to life with 3 health. On a weak hit, the flame deals only I harm and the phoenix returns with only 1 health.
Assets.Ability2: Phoenix Down: When you Face Death with your phoenix by your side, add +2 and take +1 momentum on a strong hit.
Assets.Ability3: Heart of Fire: When you Undertake a Journey through the bitter cold with your phoenix burning brightly, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Seiryuu
Assets.Foreword: Your young azure dragon is loyal.
Assets.Ability1: Of the Heavens: When you Secure an Advantage by requesting your dragon to mystically manipulate rain or wood, roll +heart and add +1. On a hit, take +1 momentum.
Assets.Ability2: Remember the Old Ways: When you Compel or Gather Information using your dragon's connection to kami or symbolic status in tradition, you may roll +heart (instead of +wits). Add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: Divine Strike: When you Strike by asking your dragon to attack, roll +heart. If the foe has shown itself to be dishonorable or not a creature of natural origins, add +1. On a hit, your dragon inflicts 3 harm.

Assets.Name: Masamune
Assets.Ability1: When you gift a blade you have forged to commemorate an important event or relationship, you may (one time only) reroll any dice when you Compel, Forge a Bond, Sojourn, or Test Your Bond.
Assets.Ability2:
When you forge or repair an exquisite blade, roll +wits. On a strong hit, choose one to apply when you Strike with it.
  • Balanced: Add +1.
  • Honed: Inflict +1 harm on a bit
  • Named: Take +1 momentum on a hit
Assets.Ability3:
When you reforge a blade with nie iron to imbue it with mystic power, roll +wits. On a strong hit, choose one. A weak hit or miss ruins the blade. If you break or discard one of these blades, Endure Stress (2 stress).
  • Baneful: Name a specific foe. When you Strike or Clash with this blade against that foe, add +1. On a hit, inflict +1 harm and take +1 momentum
  • Arcane: The blade becomes a rarity.>/li

Assets.Name: Bushido
Assets.Ability1: When you Compel or Secure an Advantage by telling a hard truth with compassion, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit. On a weak hit, envision how the hearer may take offense and complicate your situation.
Assets.Ability2: When you Face Danger or Secure an Advantage with heroic courage or exceptional loyalty, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: When you Endure Harm in direct pursuit of fulfilling an iron vow, add +1. Additionally, you may roll +heart instead of +health or +iron.

Assets.Name: Chikara Kotoba
Assets.Foreword: When you take time to center yourself and chant the resonant and rhythmic sounds of...
Assets.Ability1: Healing, roll +heart. On a strong hit, take both +1 health and +1 momentum. On a weak hit, choose only one to take.
Assets.Ability2: Clarity, roll +heart. On a hit, you may immediately Gather Information. If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: Friendship with another person or community, roll +heart. On a hit, you may immediately Forge a Bond. If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Ninjutsu
Assets.Ability1: When you Gather Information within an enemy area to discover their positions, plans, or methods, you may roll+shadow (instead of +wits). If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability2: When you Secure an Advantage or Face Danger by disguising yourself, confusing the opposition through misdirection, hiding in shadows, or vanishing without a trace, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: Before you Fulfill Your low, you may meditate upon missteps you made and commit to some significant change. If you do, either add +2 or take +1 experience on a hit.

Assets.Name: Kami Sasayaku
Assets.Ability1:
When you take time to attune yourself with the kami of an area, roll heart. On a strong hit, you connect with them favorably. Choose one
  • Comforted: Take +1 spirit.
  • Emboldened: Take +2 momentum.
  • Bonded: Forge a Bond with a specific kami and add +1.
Assets.Ability2: As above, but on a hit you may Gather Information from the spirits. If you do, roll+heart (instead of wits).
Assets.Ability3: As above, but on a strong hit, the kami offer to guide you to a destination in the area. If you accept and Undertake a Journey, you may roll +heart or +spirit (instead of wits). When you Reach Your Destination, take +2 momentum on a strong hit. Your kami guide leaves you if you Undertake a Journey to a new place, Face Desolation or Face Death.

Assets.Name: Hi Magaru
Assets.Ability1: When you draw mystical energy from a large fire, roll +wits. On a strong hit, add the value of your action die to your energy track. On a weak hit, as above but drawing in the flames is painful. Endure Harm (1 harm). You may Strike +energy with gouts of flame that inflict 3 harm. If you do, suffer-1 energy and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability2: You may Clash +energy with a fiery shield that inflicts 3 harm. If you do, suffer-1 energy and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: ou may Secure an Advantage or Face Danger+energy to create small fires that you can mentally direct. If you do, suffer-2 energy and take +1 momentum on a hit.
